available_tools.name: filter_products
available_tools.description: Filter products in a subcategory using specifications like RAM, storage, screen size, etc.

optional_params.name: price_range
optional_params.description: price range of the product - [minimum, maximum].

available_tools.name: get_product_reviews
available_tools.description: Retrieve raw reviews for a specific product, including rating, title, text, date, and helpful votes.

optional_params.name: limit
optional_params.description: maximum number of reviews to return

returns: dataframe of reviews with columns: review_id, user_id, product_id, rating, review_title, review_text, review_date, helpful_votes_count

available_tools.name: rank_products_by_reviews
available_tools.description: Rank products by average rating (optionally constrained by category/subcategory or price).

optional_params.name: limit
optional_params.description: number of top products to return

optional_params.name: min_review_count
optional_params.description: minimum number of reviews required to consider a product

returns: dataframe of products ranked by avg_rating with columns: product_id, product_name, avg_rating, review_count

available_tools.name: rank_products_by_review_count
available_tools.description: Return products ordered by number of reviews (popularity by count).

optional_params.name: min_rating
optional_params.description: only include products with avg rating >= value

returns: dataframe of products ordered by review_count with columns: product_id, product_name, review_count, avg_rating

available_tools.name: filter_products_by_review_votes
available_tools.description: Filter or surface reviews/products by helpful vote thresholds or surface top helpful reviews for a product.

optional_params.name: min_helpful_votes
optional_params.description: minimum helpful votes to include a review

optional_params.name: limit
optional_params.description: max number of reviews or products to return

returns: dataframe of reviews or products filtered by helpful votes with columns appropriate to query

available_tools.name: compare_reviews
available_tools.description: Compare review statistics (avg rating, review_count, sentiment highlights) across multiple products or brands.

mandatory_params.name: compare_ids
mandatory_params.description: list of product_ids or brand names to compare

optional_params.name: spec_keys
optional_params.description: specs to include in the comparison (optional)

optional_params.name: limit_reviews
optional_params.description: limit number of reviews to summarize per product

returns: comparison dataframe with columns: entity, avg_rating, review_count, top_positive_highlights, top_negative_highlights
